nodes.text: The Globlours were a sentient species native to a planet in the Outer Rim.
The Globlours were a sentient species standing on average 2 meters in height. They were generally considered unattractive by Humans.
Some Globlours were known to display Force-sensitivity.
Globlour society was primitive, communal, and religion-based. The leaders of the Globlour people were the priests.
As Globlours were still new to space travel, they were an uncommon sight in the greater galaxy.

The Globlours were created by Jean Balczesak and Philippe Rat for the ambiguously canon roleplaying help "Arrière-plan étoilé" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 89, and were illustrated by an uncredited artist.
